MWC.GUI.ETOPO

Class ETOPOWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • Layer
      • MWC.GUI.ETOPO.MWCETOPOLayer
        • MWC.GUI.ETOPO.ETOPOWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, BathyProvider

    public class ETOPOWrapper
extends MWCETOPOLayer
implements java.lang.Runnable, BathyProvider
    class which wraps the unusedMWCETOPOLayer defined in OpenMap
